project.title: NBAP with AVAnnotate
project.description: Experience the No Boundaries Archive Project through AVAnnotate, "an application for creating, organizing, and publishing collections of annotations for audio and video resources, making these artifacts easily discoverable and searchable."
project.creator: DataMuseology
project.authors: Jessika Davis, Olivia Townsend, Makenzie Peacock, Nora Borre, Gesel Mason
